nodes.text: The Garyn Raider's Bunker was a bunker used by the Garyn Raiders a short distance northwest of the city of Narmle on Naboo's swamp moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Following the Battle of Yavin, the bunker was the headquarters of the Garyn Raiders, a criminal organization founded by ex-Vigos of the Black Sun leader Alexi Garyn. The Garyn Raider's mountain stronghold was home to some of the most nefarious pirates on Rori. Circa 1 ABY, a spacer entered the bunker, fought some Garyn Raiders and collected an underworld blade left on a table.

The Garyn Raider's Bunker was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Garyn Raider's Bunker was added to the game with the "Publish 1" update, released on August 3, 2003.
